label: Chat Room
description: Realtime chat room contains chat items

default.label: Default
default.description: Chatrooms do not have any additional states

participant.label: Participant
participant.decription: Participants can add messages directly into this chatroom.

moderated-participant.description: Moderated participants can add messages, but their messages must be approved by a moderator before being visible by others.

moderator.label: Moderator
